function invalidChars() {
  var length = document.newPanApp.elements.length;

  for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {
    var valueAtI = document.newPanApp.elements[i].value;

    if (valueAtI.indexOf("~") >= 0 || valueAtI.indexOf("^") >= 0) {
      alert("Please do not enter '~' or '^'");
      document.newPanApp.elements[i].focus();
      return false;
    }
  }

  return true;
}

function eMailValidation() {
  var eMail = document.newPanApp.PAN_EMAIL.value;

  if (eMail != "") {
    var eMailregex = new RegExp("^[A-Za-z0-9\\*\\#\\$\\&]+[A-Za-z0-9\\_\\*\\#\\$\\&]*(\\.[A-Za-z0-9\\_\\*\\#\\$\\&]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9\\_\\*\\#\\$\\&]+(\\.[A-Za-z0-9\\*\\#\\$\\&]+)+$");

    if (!eMail.match(eMailregex)) {
      alert("Please Enter valid e-mail ID");
      document.newPanApp.PAN_EMAIL.focus();
      return false;
    }
  }

  return true;
}

    var re = /^[a-zA-Z0-9 \(\)\,\.\&\-\{\}\*\$\#\{\}\[\]\'\\\/\~\`\!\@\^\_\+\=\|\;\:\"\?\<\>\%]*$/;

  } else {
    return true;
  }
}

function changeStatus(name, val) {
  var length = document.newPanApp.elements.length;
  var nameAtI = "";

  for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {

  }

  if (cnt > 1) {

      titleObj = eval("document.newPanApp." + titleName + "[" + i + "]");

}

function checkLastName(textValue) {
  if (textValue != "") {
    var re = /^[0-9a-zA-Z \']*$/;
    var resultValue = re.test(textValue);

    if (resultValue == true) {
      if (charCount(textValue) > 1) {
        resultValue = false;
      }
    }

    return resultValue;
  } else {
    return true;
  }
}

function checkCardName(textValue) {
  if (textValue != "") {
    var re = /^[0-9a-zA-Z \'\.]*$/;
    var resultValue = re.test(textValue);

    if (resultValue == true) {
      if (charCount(textValue) > 1) {
        resultValue = false;
      }
    }

    return resultValue;
  } else {
    return true;
  }
}

function checkRANameValue(textValue) {
  if (textValue != "") {
    var re = /^[0-9a-zA-Z ]*$/;
    var resultValue = re.test(textValue);
    return resultValue;
  } else {
    return true;
  }
}

function checkAlNameValue(textValue) {
  if (textValue != "") {
    var re = /^[a-zA-Z ]*$/;
    var resultValue = re.test(textValue);
    return resultValue;
  } else {
    return true;
  }
}

function checkNameValue(textValue) {
  //  alert(textValue);
  if (textValue != "") {
    var re = /^[a-zA-Z0-9 \#\.\-\{\}\(\)\$\*\[\]\,\\\/\&\']*$/;
    var resultValue = re.test(textValue);

    if (resultValue == true) {
      //    alert("resultValue==true");
      if (charCount(textValue) > 1) {
        resultValue = false;
      }
    } //    alert(resultValue);


    return resultValue;
  } else {
    return true;
  }
}

function charCount(text) {
  var count = 0;

  for (i = 0; i < text.length; i++) {
    if (text.substring(i, i + 1) == "'") {
      count++;
    }
  }

  return count;
}

function checkforHash() {
  var flag = true;
  flag = CheckAO();

  if (!flag) {

  }

  if (!flag) {
    return false;
  }

  flag = eMailValidation();

  if (!flag) {
    return false;
  }
  /*
  flag =  checkNonPrintableSpecialChars();
  if(!flag) {
  return false;
  }*/


  flag = checkNameHashValues();

  if (!flag) {
    return false;
  }

  flag = sendHashValues();

  if (!flag) {
    return false;
  }

  var returnValue = onSubmitCheckPrivateLimited();
  if (returnValue) return true;else return false;
  return true;
}
